description:
Text Generation Input.

Auto-generated from TGI specs.
For more details, check out https://github.com/huggingface/huggingface.js/blob/main/packages/tasks/scripts/inference-tgi-import.ts.
title: TextGenerationInput

inputs.example: My name is Olivier and I

best_of.description: Generate best_of sequences and return the one if the highest token logprobs.

decoder_input_details.description: Whether to return decoder input token logprobs and ids.

frequency_penalty.description:
The parameter for frequency penalty. 1.0 means no penalty
Penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far,
decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

max_new_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate.

repetition_penalty.description:
The parameter for repetition penalty. 1.0 means no penalty.
See [this paper](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1909.05858.pdf) for more details.

return_full_text.description: Whether to prepend the prompt to the generated text

stop.description: Stop generating tokens if a member of `stop` is generated.

temperature.description: The value used to module the logits distribution.

top_k.description: The number of highest probability vocabulary tokens to keep for top-k-filtering.

top_n_tokens.description: The number of highest probability vocabulary tokens to keep for top-n-filtering.

truncate.description: Truncate inputs tokens to the given size.

typical_p.description:
Typical Decoding mass
See [Typical Decoding for Natural Language Generation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.00666) for more information.

watermark.description: Watermarking with [A Watermark for Large Language Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2301.10226).

value.description:
A string that represents a [JSON Schema](https://json-schema.org/).

JSON Schema is a declarative language that allows to annotate JSON documents
with types and descriptions.
